text: greetings my name is Matt Wood and I'm
here to give you a quick update on
Amazon machine learning we have two new
features available to all customers for
Amazon machine learning number one the
ability to be able to shuffle your
training data for improved model quality
Amazon machine learning creates better
models when input rows are presented to
the algorithm in a random order so with
this new training parameter option you
can have Amazon machine learning Shuffle
the order of your rows of your training
data automatically data shuffling will
be turned on by default in the console
and can be controlled via the API and
the SDK secondly we're making it easier
to connect to data which is currently
stored in Amazon redshift by using the
metadata in redshift tables to populate
the model training data schema in Amazon
machine learning it's less manual it's
more accurate that's it two new features
for Amazon machine learning available
today thanks a lot
